title: TRIGGER_IS_CHANGED_FROM
description: Returns TRUE if the specified field's value has changed from any of the provided old values in the current trigger context; otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: field_name
parameters.description: The API name of the field to evaluate.

parameters.name: … old_values
parameters.description: One or more values to compare against the field’s previous value. If the previous value matches any of the specified values and the new value is different, the function returns TRUE.

examples:
TRIGGER_IS_CHANGED_FROM("Status", "New", "Pending")
-- Returns TRUE if Status was either "New" or "Pending" and has been changed to another status.
